metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3558 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ReflectionHelper (org.hibernate.validator.util.ReflectionHelper) in Hibernate Validator 4.1.0 before 4.2.1, 4.3.x before 4.3.2, and 5.x before 5.1.2 allows attackers to bypass Java Security Manager (JSM) restrictions and execute restricted reflection calls via a crafted application.

criterions.comment: libhibernate-validator-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
